'''White Heron Hairpin''' is a furnishing item obtainable as a gift from [[Kamisato Ayaka]] as part of the [[Grus Nivis Chapter]] Act I: [[The Whispers of the Crane and the White Rabbit]].

==Description==
It is a hairpin representative of a white heron in a black box decorated with gold pieces and some grey embossing. It is gifted to the [[Traveler]] by Kamisato Ayaka after collecting the kimono made as a greeting gift for [[Tsubaki]].
